description: Homepage of the WP-CLI project.

description: Guides on how to use or extend WP-CLI.

description: Reference documentation for all the official WP-CLI commands.

name: Make WordPress.org
description: CLI - Main entry point for contributing to WP-CLI.

name: Contributing guide
description: Everything you need to know to contribute to the tool or its infrastructure.

name: Official MakeWP Slack
description: Official Slack team where all international contributions to WordPress and its teams are discussed.

name: #cli channel
description: The official support channel for WP-CLI and the WordPress CLI team.

name: Good first issues
description: List of issues on that are limited in scope and complexity.

name: WP-CLI GitHub organization
description: Canonical home of the WP-CLI source code.

name: WP-CLI framework repository
description: The source code for the WP-CLI framework that powers all of the commands.

name: WP-CLI bundle repository
description: The source for the WP-CLI "binary" and how it is assembled.

name: WP-CLI tests repository
description: The testing framework used throughout all WP-CLI repositories.

name: Packagist.org search by WP-CLI package type
description: Composer packages filtered by type wp-cli-package.

name: GitHub.com search for WP-CLI integrations
description: Heavily pre-filtered search for repositories that use WP_CLI::add_command().

name: Yoast/wp-cli-faker
description: Generate fake WordPress and WooCommerce content for testing purposes.

name: aaemnnosttv/wp-cli-login-command
description: Login to WordPress with secure passwordless magic links.

name: schlessera/wp-cli-psysh
description: Replace WP-CLI shell standard REPL with PsySH.

name: php-stubs/wp-cli-stubs
description: WP-CLI function and class declaration stubs for static analysis.

name: An Introduction to WP-CLI
description: Introductory article that introduces the main concepts and some popular use cases of WP-CLI.

name: Controlling WordPress through the Command Line
description: Introductory talk that covers the very basics of the command line for people who never used the console before.

name: WP Bullet WP-CLI Guides
description: Snippet-based guides that solve specific use cases.

name: Siteground Webinar: Learn How WP-CLI Can Make Your Life Easier
description: Practical examples on how you can improve your workflows with WP-CLI.
